page.title: 06Local Industry
page.content: There are a number of small businesses in the Salhouse, Rackheath and Little Plumstead area ranging from heating engineers to a sack manufacturer and traditional craftsmen such as reed thatchers.None of these employs many people and apart from the few local shops,the main employment in the area is located on the new{Rackheath {Industrial Estate.} The estate houses a diversity of industries including bulk grain storage; a cabinet maker; farming machinery suppliers; marine window manufacturers and a firm making fibre glass boats including lifeboats. The estate is continuing to grow and there are plots of land for sale and units for lease from Broadland District Council.The estate is surrounded on all sides by farmland.
